languages.text: Ключевая пассивная {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} ассасина, {g|f:74a1e39f3d0c4cab828d49d4acd54851}Знать слабые места{/g}, позволяет им видеть уязвимые точки у противника, {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}удар{/g} по которым будет наиболее эффективным и нанесет дополнительный {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} в размере 10% от максимального {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g} цели. Ключевая активная способность, {g|f:e2af8c0124f94ca5b9a8b3f91982908a}Поиск слабого места{/g}, позволяет ассасину создавать дополнительные {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}слабые места{/g} на ближайшей к персонажу стороне. {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Героический акт{/g} ассасина проводит атаку по цели. Эта атака всегда попадает и наносит на 50% больше урона, а также дополнительный урон в объеме 25% от потерянного здоровья цели. Для этой атаки {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонение{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}снижение уклонения{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}пробитие брони{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}снижение парирования{/g} ассасина удвоены. Важные {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}характеристики{/g} ассасина: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкость{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Восприятие{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближний Бой{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Дальний Бой{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Навыки{/g} ассасина: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Наблюдательность{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Медицина{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Напор{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Атлетика{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Устойчивость{/g}.

Assassins have a passive keystone {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} called {g|f:74a1e39f3d0c4cab828d49d4acd54851}Seek the Opening{/g}, which allows them to see their enemy's weak spots. If the Assassin attacks a target from a side that has an {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}opening{/g}, the attack will be particularly effective and deal additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} equal to 10% of the target's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}. Their active keystone ability, {g|f:e2af8c0124f94ca5b9a8b3f91982908a}Aim for the Opening{/g}, allows the Assassin to create additional openings on the side of an enemy closest to them. The Assassin's {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} makes an attack against a target. This attack always {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} and deals +50% more damage as well as additional damage equal to 25% of the target's missing {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}. For this attack, the Assassin's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}parry reduction{/g} are doubled. Key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Skills{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Awareness{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Coercion{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athletics{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Carouse{/g}.
languages.original_text: Ключевая пассивная способность ассасина, Знать слабые места, позволяет им видеть уязвимые точки у противника, удар по которым будет наиболее эффективным и нанесет дополнительный урон в размере 10% от максимальных очков здоровья цели. Ключевая активная способность, Поиск слабого места, позволяет ассасину создавать дополнительные уязвимые точки на ближайшей к персонажу стороне. Героический акт ассасина проводит атаку по цели. Эта атака всегда попадает и наносит на 50% больше урона, а также дополнительный урон в объеме 25% от потерянных очков здоровья цели. Для этой атаки уклонение, снижение уклонения, пробитие брони и снижение парирования ассасина удвоены. Важные характеристики ассасина: Ловкость, Восприятие, Ближний Бой, Дальний Бой Навыки ассасина: Наблюдательность, Медицина, Напор, Атлетика, Устойчивость.

traits.locale_text: Assassins have a passive keystone ability called Seek an Opening, which allows them to see their enemy's weak spots. If the Assassin attacks a target from a side that has an opening, the attack will be particularly effective and deal additional damage equal to 10% of the target's maximum wounds. The active keystone ability Aim for the Opening allows the Assassin to create additional openings on the side closest to them. The Assassin's heroic act makes an attack against a target. This attack always hits and deals +50% more damage as well as additional damage equal to 25% of the target's missing wounds. For this attack, the Assassin's dodge, dodge reduction, armour penetration, and parry reduction are doubled. Key characteristics: Agility, Perception, Weapon Skill, Ballistic Skill. Skills: Awareness, Medicae, Coercion, Athletics, Carouse.

Assassins have a passive keystone ability called Seek an Opening, which allows them to see their enemy's weak spots. If the Assassin attacks a target from a side that has an opening, the attack will be particularly effective and deal additional damage equal to 10% of the target's maximum wounds. The active keystone ability Aim for the Opening allows the Assassin to create additional openings on the side closest to them. The Assassin's heroic act makes an attack against a target. This attack always hits and deals +50% more damage as well as additional damage equal to 25% of the target's missing wounds. For this attack, the Assassin's dodge, dodge reduction, armour penetration, and parry reduction are doubled. Key characteristics: Agility, Perception, Weapon Skill, Ballistic Skill. Skills: Awareness, Medicae, Coercion, Athletics, Carouse.

The Assassin's heroic act makes an attack against a target. This attack always hits and deals +50% more damage as well as additional damage equal to 25% of the target's missing wounds. For this attack, the Assassin's dodge, dodge reduction, armour penetration, and parry reduction are doubled. Key characteristics: Agility, Perception, Weapon Skill, Ballistic Skill. Skills: Awareness, Medicae, Coercion, Athletics, Carouse.

Key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Skills{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Awareness{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Coercion{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athletics{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Carouse{/g}.

languages.text: Assassinen haben eine passive wesentliche {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} namens {g|f:74a1e39f3d0c4cab828d49d4acd54851}Eine Blöße suchen{/g}, die ihnen erlaubt, den Schwachpunkt ihres Feindes zu sehen. Greift ein Assassine ein Ziel von einer Seite an, die eine {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}Blöße{/g} hat, ist der Angriff besonders effektiv und verursacht {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Zusatzschaden{/g} entsprechend 10 % der {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximalen Wunden{/g} des Ziels. Seine aktive wesentliche Fähigkeit, {g|f:e2af8c0124f94ca5b9a8b3f91982908a}Blöße ausnutzen{/g}, erlaubt dem Assassinen das Schaffen zusätzlicher Blößen an der Seite eines Feindes, der ihm an nächsten ist. Die {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Heldentat{/g} des Assassinen vollzieht einen Angriff an einem Ziel. Dieser Angriff {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}trifft{/g} immer und verursacht +50 % mehr Schaden und außerdem Zusatzschaden entsprechend 25 % der fehlenden {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} des Ziels. Bei diesem Angriff verdoppeln sich {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}Ausweichen-Reduktion{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Rüstungsdurchdringung{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}Parieren-Reduktion{/g} des Assassinen. {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Schlüsseleigenschaften{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfähigkeit{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistik-Fähigkeit{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Fertigkeiten{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Bewusstheit{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Zwang{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athletik{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Zechen{/g}.

If the Assassin attacks a target from a side that has an {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}opening{/g}, the attack will be particularly effective and deal additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} equal to 10% of the target's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}. Their active keystone ability, {g|f:e2af8c0124f94ca5b9a8b3f91982908a}Aim for the Opening{/g}, allows the Assassin to create additional openings on the side of an enemy closest to them. For this attack, the Assassin's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}parry reduction{/g} are doubled. traits.locale_text: Assassinen haben eine passive wesentliche {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} namens {g|f:74a1e39f3d0c4cab828d49d4acd54851}Eine Blöße suchen{/g} >, die ihnen erlaubt, den Schwachpunkt ihres Feindes zu sehen. Greift ein Assassine ein Ziel von einer Seite an, die eine {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}Blöße{/g} hat, ist der Angriff besonders effektiv und verursacht {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Zusatzschaden{/g} entsprechend 10 % der {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximalen Wunden{/g} des Ziels. Seine aktive wesentliche Fähigkeit, {g|f:e2af8c0124f94ca5b9a8b3f91982908a}Blöße ausnutzen{/g}, erlaubt dem Assassinen das Schaffen zusätzlicher Blößen an der Seite eines Feindes, der ihm an nächsten ist. Die {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Heldentat{/g} des Assassinen vollzieht einen Angriff an einem Ziel. Dieser Angriff {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}trifft{/g} immer und verursacht +50 % mehr Schaden und außerdem Zusatzschaden entsprechend 25 % der fehlenden {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} des Ziels. Bei diesem Angriff verdoppeln sich {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}Ausweichen-Reduktion{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Rüstungsdurchdringung{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}Parieren-Reduktion{/g} des Assassinen. {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Schlüsseleigenschaften{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfertigkeit{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistik-Fertigkeit{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Fertigkeiten{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Bewusstheit{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Zwang{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athletik{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Zechen{/g}.

Assassinen haben eine passive wesentliche {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} namens Eine {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}Blöße{/g} suchen, die ihnen erlaubt, den Schwachpunkt ihres Feindes zu sehen. Greift ein Assassine ein Ziel von einer Seite an, die eine Blöße hat, ist der Angriff besonders effektiv und verursacht {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Zusatzschaden{/g} entsprechend 10 % der {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximalen Wunden{/g} des Ziels. Seine aktive wesentliche Fähigkeit, Blöße ausnutzen, erlaubt dem Assassinen das Schaffen zusätzlicher Blößen an der Seite eines Feindes, der ihm an nächsten ist. Die {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Heldentat{/g} des Assassinen vollzieht einen Angriff an einem Ziel. Dieser Angriff {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}trifft{/g} immer und verursacht +50 % mehr Schaden und außerdem Zusatzschaden entsprechend 25 % der fehlenden {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} des Ziels. Bei diesem Angriff verdoppeln sich {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}Ausweichen-Reduktion{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Rüstungsdurchdringung{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}Parieren-Reduktion{/g} des Assassinen. {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Schlüsseleigenschaften{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfähigkeit{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistik-Fähigkeit{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Fertigkeiten{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Bewusstheit{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Zwang{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athletik{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Zechen{/g}.

languages.text: Les assassins disposent d'une {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} passive clé appelée {g|f:74a1e39f3d0c4cab828d49d4acd54851}Chercher la brèche{/g}, qui leur permet d'identifier les points faibles de leur ennemi. Si l'assassin attaque une cible sur un flanc présentant une brèche, l'attaque se révélera particulièrement efficace et infligera des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} supplémentaires correspondant à 10 % de la réserve de {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}blessures maximum{/g} de la cible. Sa capacité active clé, {g|f:e2af8c0124f94ca5b9a8b3f91982908a}Viser la brèche{/g}, permet à l'assassin d'ouvrir des brèches supplémentaires sur le flanc de l'ennemi le plus proche de lui. L'{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acte héroïque{/g} de l'assassin lance une attaque contre une cible. Cette attaque {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touche toujours{/g} sa cible et inflige +50 % de dégâts en plus des dégâts supplémentaires correspondant à 25 % des {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} manquantes de la cible. Pour cette attaque, l'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g}, la {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}réduction d'esquive{/g}, la {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}pénétration d'armure{/g} et la {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}réduction de parade{/g} de la cible sont doublées. {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Caractéristiques{/g} clés : {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Capacité de combat{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Capacité de tir{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Compétences{/g} : {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Vigilance{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Intimidation{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athlétisme{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Résistance aux intoxications{/g}.

If the Assassin attacks a target from a side that has an {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}opening{/g}, the attack will be particularly effective and deal additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} equal to 10% of the target's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}. Their active keystone ability, {g|f:e2af8c0124f94ca5b9a8b3f91982908a}Aim for the Opening{/g}, allows the Assassin to create additional openings on the side of an enemy closest to them. This attack always {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} and deals +50% more damage as well as additional damage equal to 25% of the target's missing {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}. For this attack, the Assassin's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}parry reduction{/g} are doubled. Key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Skills{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Awareness{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Coercion{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athletics{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Carouse{/g}.

L'{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acte héroïque{/g} de l'assassin lance une attaque contre une cible. Cette attaque {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touche toujours{/g} sa cible et inflige +50 % de dégâts en plus des dégâts supplémentaires correspondant à 25 % des {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} manquantes de la cible. Pour cette attaque, l'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g}, la {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}réduction d'esquive{/g}, la {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}pénétration d'armure{/g} et la {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}réduction de parade{/g} de la cible sont doublées. {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Caractéristiques{/g} clés : {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Capacité de combat{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Capacité de tir{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Compétences{/g} : {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Vigilance{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Intimidation{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athlétisme{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Résistance aux intoxications{/g}.

Les Assassins disposent d'une {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} passive clé appelée Chercher la {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}Brèche{/g}, qui leur permet d'identifier les points faibles de leur ennemi. Si l'Assassin attaque une cible sur un flanc présentant une brèche, l'attaque se révélera particulièrement efficace et infligera des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} supplémentaires correspondant à 10 % de la réserve de {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}blessures maximum{/g} de la cible. Sa capacité active clé, Viser la Brèche, permet à l'Assassin d'ouvrir des brèches supplémentaires sur le flanc de l'ennemi le plus proche de lui. L'{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acte héroïque{/g} de l'Assassin lance une attaque contre une cible. Cette attaque fait toujours {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}mouche{/g} et inflige +50 % de dégâts en plus des dégâts supplémentaires correspondant à 25 % des {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} manquantes de la cible. Pour cette attaque, l'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g}, la {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}réduction d'esquive{/g}, la {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}pénétration d'armure{/g} et la {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}réduction de parade{/g} de la cible sont doublées. {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Caractéristiques{/g} clés : {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Capacité de Combat{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Capacité de Tir{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Compétences{/g} : {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Vigilance{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Intimidation{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athlétisme{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Résistance aux intoxications{/g}.

languages.text: 刺客的关键{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}：{g|f:74a1e39f3d0c4cab828d49d4acd54851}发现破绽{/g}，可以看到敌人的弱点。刺客从有{g|Encyclopedia:Opening}破绽{/g}的一侧攻击目标时会造成额外{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}，额外伤害等同于目标{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大生命值{/g}的10%。 刺客的关键主动能力：{g|f:e2af8c0124f94ca5b9a8b3f91982908a}瞄准破绽{/g}，可以在离敌人最近的一侧制造额外的伤害。 刺客的{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄壮举{/g}可以对单体目标发动攻击。此次攻击必定{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}目标，造成的伤害提高50%。此外，还会造成额外伤害，等同于目标已损失{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}的25%。 刺客的{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}闪避减免{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}护甲穿透{/g}和{g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}招架减免{/g}在此次攻击中翻倍。 关键{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}属性{/g}：{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}。 {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}技能{/g}：{g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}警觉{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}医疗{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}胁迫{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}运动{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}饮酒{/g}。
languages.original_text: Assassins have a passive keystone {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} called {g|f:74a1e39f3d0c4cab828d49d4acd54851}Seek the Opening{/g}, which allows them to see their enemy's weak spots. If the Assassin attacks a target from a side that has an {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}opening{/g}, the attack will be particularly effective and deal additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} equal to 10% of the target's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}. Their active keystone ability, {g|f:e2af8c0124f94ca5b9a8b3f91982908a}Aim for the Opening{/g}, allows the Assassin to create additional openings on the side of an enemy closest to them. The Assassin's {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} makes an attack against a target. This attack always {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} and deals +50% more damage as well as additional damage equal to 25% of the target's missing {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}. For this attack, the Assassin's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}parry reduction{/g} are doubled. Key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Skills{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Awareness{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Coercion{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athletics{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Carouse{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 刺客的关键{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}：发现{g|Encyclopedia:Opening}破绽{/g}，可以看到敌人的弱点。刺客从有破绽的一侧攻击目标时会造成额外{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}，额外伤害等同于目标{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大生命值{/g}的10%。 刺客的关键主动能力：瞄准破绽，可以在离敌人最近的一侧制造额外的伤害。 刺客的{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄壮举{/g}可以对单体目标发动攻击。此次攻击必定{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}目标，造成的伤害提高50%。此外，还会造成额外伤害，等同于目标已损失{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}的25%。 刺客的{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}闪避减免{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}护甲穿透{/g}和{g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}招架减免{/g}在此次攻击中翻倍。 关键{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}属性{/g}：{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}。 {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}技能{/g}：{g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}警觉{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}医疗{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}胁迫{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}运动{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}饮酒{/g}。

languages.text: Los asesinos tienen una {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} pasiva clave llamada {g|f:74a1e39f3d0c4cab828d49d4acd54851}Buscar una abertura{/g}, que les permite ver los puntos débiles del enemigo. Si el asesino ataca a un objetivo desde un flanco que tenga una {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}abertura{/g}, su ofensiva será especialmente efectiva y causará un {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} adicional equivalente al 10 % de las {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}heridas máximas{/g} del objetivo. La capacidad activa clave de los asesinos, {g|f:e2af8c0124f94ca5b9a8b3f91982908a}Apuntar al hueco{/g}, les permite crear aberturas adicionales en el flanco más cercano del enemigo. El {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acto heroico{/g} de los asesinos consta de un ataque contra un objetivo. Este ataque siempre {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacta{/g} e inflige +50 % más de daño, además de otro adicional equivalente al 25 % de las {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} perdidas por el objetivo. Durante este ataque, se duplican la {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g}, la {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}reducción de esquiva{/g}, la {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}penetración de reducción{/g} y la {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}reducción de parada{/g} del asesino en cuestión. {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Características{/g} relevantes: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Percepción{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Habilidad de proyectiles{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Habilidades{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Atención{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Coacción{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Atletismo{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Juerga{/g}.
languages.original_text: Assassins have a passive keystone {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} called {g|f:74a1e39f3d0c4cab828d49d4acd54851}Seek the Opening{/g}, which allows them to see their enemy's weak spots. If the Assassin attacks a target from a side that has an {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}opening{/g}, the attack will be particularly effective and deal additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} equal to 10% of the target's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}. Their active keystone ability, {g|f:e2af8c0124f94ca5b9a8b3f91982908a}Aim for the Opening{/g}, allows the Assassin to create additional openings on the side of an enemy closest to them. The Assassin's {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} makes an attack against a target. This attack always {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} and deals +50% more damage as well as additional damage equal to 25% of the target's missing {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}. For this attack, the Assassin's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}parry reduction{/g} are doubled. Key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Skills{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Awareness{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Coercion{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athletics{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Carouse{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Los asesinos tienen una {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} pasiva clave llamada {g|f:74a1e39f3d0c4cab828d49d4acd54851}Buscar una abertura{/g}, que les permite ver los puntos débiles del enemigo. Si el asesino ataca a un objetivo desde un flanco que tenga una {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}abertura{/g}, su ofensiva será especialmente efectiva y causará un {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} adicional equivalente al 10 % de las {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}heridas máximas{/g} del objetivo. La capacidad activa clave de los asesinos, {g|f:e2af8c0124f94ca5b9a8b3f91982908a}Apuntar al hueco{/g}, les permite crear aberturas adicionales en el flanco más cercano del enemigo. El {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acto heroico{/g} de los asesinos consta de un ataque contra un objetivo. Este ataque siempre {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacta{/g} e inflige +50 % más de daño, además de otro adicional equivalente al 25 % de las {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} perdidas por el objetivo. Durante este ataque, se duplican la {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g}, la {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}reducción de esquiva{/g}, la {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}penetración de reducción{/g} y la {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}reducción de parada{/g} del asesino en cuestión. {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Características{/g} relevantes: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Percepción{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Habilidad de proyectiles{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Habilidades{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Atención{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Coacción{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Atletismo{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Juerga{/g}.

languages.original_text: The assassin's key passive ability, Know Weaknesses, allows them to see vulnerable points on the enemy that will be most effective and deal an additional 10% of the target's maximum health points. The key active ability, Find Weakness, allows the assassin to create additional vulnerable points on the side closest to the character. The assassin's heroic act makes an attack against the target. This attack always hits and deals 50% more damage and an additional 25% of the target's lost health points. For this attack, the Assassin's Evasion, Evasion Reduction, Armour Piercing, and Parry Piercing are doubled. Important Assassin Traits: Dexterity, Perception, Close Combat, Ranged Combat. AssassinSkills: Observation, Medicine, Pressure, Athleticism, Resilience.

languages.text: アサシンには主要なパッシブ{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}である{g|f:74a1e39f3d0c4cab828d49d4acd54851}隙探り{/g}があり、これにより彼らは敵の弱点を見ることができる。アサシンのターゲットに対する{g|Encyclopedia:Opening}隙{/g}のある方向からの攻撃は特に効果的であり、ターゲットの体力の{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大値{/g}の10％に相当する追加{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与える。 彼らの主なアビリティである{g|f:e2af8c0124f94ca5b9a8b3f91982908a}隙狙い{/g}では、アサシンは自身に最も近い敵の側面に追加の隙を作り出すことができる。 アサシンの{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄的行為{/g}はターゲットに対して攻撃を行う。この攻撃は必ず{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}し＋50％の追加ダメージを与え、またターゲットが失った体力の25％に相当する追加{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}ダメージ{/g}を与える。 この攻撃でのアサシンの{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}回避減少{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}アーマー貫通{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}受け流し減少{/g}が倍になる。 主な{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}特性{/g}：{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷性{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}認知力{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}近接攻撃{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}射撃技能{/g}。 {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}スキル{/g}：{g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}認識力{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}メディケア{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}強制力{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}身体能力{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}身体作用耐性{/g}。
languages.original_text: Assassins have a passive keystone {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} called {g|f:74a1e39f3d0c4cab828d49d4acd54851}Seek the Opening{/g}, which allows them to see their enemy's weak spots. If the Assassin attacks a target from a side that has an {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}opening{/g}, the attack will be particularly effective and deal additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} equal to 10% of the target's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}. Their active keystone ability, {g|f:e2af8c0124f94ca5b9a8b3f91982908a}Aim for the Opening{/g}, allows the Assassin to create additional openings on the side of an enemy closest to them. The Assassin's {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} makes an attack against a target. This attack always {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} and deals +50% more damage as well as additional damage equal to 25% of the target's missing {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}. For this attack, the Assassin's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}parry reduction{/g} are doubled. Key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Skills{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Awareness{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Coercion{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athletics{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Carouse{/g}.

For this attack, the Assassin's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}parry reduction{/g} are doubled. Key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Skills{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Awareness{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Coercion{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athletics{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Carouse{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Assassins have a passive keystone {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} {g|f:74a1e39f3d0c4cab828d49d4acd54851}Seek the Opening{/g}, which allows them to see their enemy's weak spots. If the Assassin attacks a target from a side that has an {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}opening{/g}, the attack will be particularly effective and deal additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} equal to 10% of the target's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}. Their active keystone ability, {g|f:e2af8c0124f94ca5b9a8b3f91982908a}Aim for the Opening{/g}, allows the Assassin to create additional openings on the side of an enemy closest to them. The Assassin's {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} makes an attack against a target. This attack always {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} and deals +50% more damage as well as additional damage equal to 25% of the target's missing {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}. For this attack, the Assassin's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}parry reduction{/g} are doubled. Key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Skills{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Awareness{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Coercion{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athletics{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Carouse{/g}.

languages.text: Suikastçılar, {g|f:74a1e39f3d0c4cab828d49d4acd54851}Açıklık Ara{/g} adı verilen ve düşmanlarının zayıf noktalarını görmelerine yarayan pasif bir kilit {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyete{/g} sahiptirler. Suikastçı bir hedefe, {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}açıklığı{/g} olan bir taraftan saldırırsa saldırı bilhassa etkili olur ve hedefin {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maksimum sağlık{/g} puanının %10'u kadar ilave {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} verir. Aktif kilit kabiliyet {g|f:e2af8c0124f94ca5b9a8b3f91982908a}Açıklığı Hedefle{/g}, Suikastçı'nın kendisine en yakın tarafta fazladan açıklıklar oluşturmasını sağlar. Suikastçı'nın {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}kahramanca eylemi{/g} bir hedefe saldırı gerçekleştirir. Bu saldırı her daim {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vurur{/g} ve +%50 fazla hasarın yanı sıra hedefin eksik {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} puanının %25'i kadar daha ilave hasar verir. Bu saldırı için Suikastçı'nın {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}kaçınma azaltımı{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}zırh delme{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}savuşturma azaltımı{/g} değerleri iki katına çıkar. Kilit {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}nitelikler{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Çeviklik{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Algı{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Silah Yeteneği{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Balistik Yetenek{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Yetenekler{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Farkındalık{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Sıhhiye{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Gözdağı{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Atletizm{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Tiryakilik{/g}.

If the Assassin attacks a target from a side that has an {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}opening{/g}, the attack will be particularly effective and deal additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} equal to 10% of the target's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}. For this attack, the Assassin's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}parry reduction{/g} are doubled.
